execution_plan.description: Compute total revenue in EUR from the EU sales database (aggregate orders.total_eur).
execution_plan.query: SELECT 'EU' AS region, SUM(total_eur) AS revenue_eur FROM orders;

execution_plan.description: Compute total revenue in EUR from the US sales database (aggregate orders.total_eur).
execution_plan.query: SELECT 'US' AS region, SUM(total_eur) AS revenue_eur FROM orders;
